summary: Provides a graph transformation that computes the top‑k singular values and associated left/right singular vectors of a graph to create positional encodings for each node, optionally padding when k exceeds the node count and randomly flipping sign for regularization, and stores the encodings as a node feature.
business_intent: Enable graph neural networks to incorporate global structural cues through learned positional embeddings, serving as a drop‑in replacement for traditional graph convolutional layers.
